Welcome!

I'm Maria, a passionate Software Engineer with nearly 4 years of experience specializing in full-stack development, from sophisticated user interfaces using React and JavaScript to robust backend solutions with Spring Boot and Java. I thrive in dynamic settings, providing innovative solutions for a no-code software automation platform that enhances user experiences and optimizes operations.

What I Do

I design, build, and maintain applications with clean, efficient code, whether they’re innovative frontend features or high-performance microservices architectures. Here, you’ll find my projects, my thoughts on the latest technologies, and more about my journey as a software engineer.
